mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1521) for an order placed by Mr. Thomas for 100 two color window cards for a performance by the Chuck Wagon Gang at Trigg County High School on June 17. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
